summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to matching financial support for neighborhood improvement activity; revising the 1998 annual budget by increasing appropriations for the Neighborhood Matching Subfund and various City departments; and making a reimbursable appropriation and transfer from the Supplemental Appropriation Account of the Emergency Subfund; and amending Ordinance 114990 to increase the maximum size of "small and simple" projects to be supported by the Neighborhood Matching Subfund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Neighborhoods, Growth Planning and Civic Engagement
